name: ts-core
description: Common classes for typescript based projects
author: Renat Gubaev

scripts.postinstall1: for d in packages/*; do echo "---npm install in $d---" && cd $(pwd)/$d && npm install && cd -; done
scripts.build:samples: gulp install:samples && npm run build && gulp build:samples && gulp test:samples && gulp test:e2e:samples
scripts.publish: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --force-publish --access public --exact -m "chore(@ts-core) publish %s release"
scripts.publish:rc: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --npm-tag=rc --access public -m "chore(@ts-core) publish %s release"
scripts.publish:next: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --npm-tag=next --access public --skip-git -m "chore(@ts-core) publish %s release"
scripts.publish:beta: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --npm-tag=beta --access public -m "chore(@ts-core) publish %s release"
scripts.publish:test: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --force-publish --access public --npm-tag=test --skip-git -m "chore(@ts-core) publish %s release"
